data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe a time in your life when you were very busy.
data.answer: It was the last couple of weeks of the semester in 2016, and I was in the final year of my bachelor's degree. During this period, I was rather busy as I had to complete my final year project while getting ready for the final year exam simultaneously. On the very first day, I realized that I had to make a proper timetable for both works. Otherwise, it would be highly likely that I lose either a final year project or exam, which both were equally important for completing my degree. Though I spent a few hours making that plan it was really helpful for me to manage both tasks without getting too stressed. Even though I had a plan and timetable for my work, I had to work 15-18 hours per day with few hours' sleep. Some days I felt that I was going to suffer from shock or even die of tiredness. But after having a short interval of break - a hot shower usually served the purpose - I was able to reduce my stress down to a certain level, and eventually, I went through those bleakest times throughout the course. （192 字）

options.content: How did you manage your time?
